text: And thus — in the same manner of revelation — have We revealed to you an Arabic Qur’ān that you may warn that you may threaten the mother-town and those around it namely the inhabitants of Mecca and all other people and that you may warn all people of the Day of Gathering the Day of Resurrection whereat all creatures will be gathered of which there is no doubt. A part of them will be in Paradise and a part will be in the Blaze the Fire.
